question: Can you help me design a futuristic eco-friendly house and generate an image of it?

steps.content: Can you help me design a futuristic eco-friendly house and generate an image of it?
Plan: 1) Search for features of futuristic eco-friendly house designs. 2) Generate an image of the house. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for features of futuristic eco-friendly house designs.
Futuristic eco-friendly house designs often include solar panels, green roofs, rainwater harvesting systems, and smart home technology.
Generating an image of a futuristic eco-friendly house with solar panels, green roofs, and smart home technology.
Image of the futuristic eco-friendly house generated.
Can you add a vertical garden to the design?
Plan: 1) Update the house design to include a vertical garden. 2) Generate a new image of the house. 3) Return the updated answer.
Generating an updated image of the house with a vertical garden.
Updated image of the house with a vertical garden generated.
What materials should be used for sustainable construction?
Plan: 1) Search for sustainable construction materials. 2) Return the answer.
Sustainable construction materials include bamboo, recycled steel, reclaimed wood, and insulated concrete forms.
